data.title: Sylvia Vaughn Thompson
data.meta_description: Sylvia Vaughn Thompson is an American food writer and chef. Thompson has written several cookbooks, including Feasts and Friends: Recipes from a Lifetime (1988), with a foreword by Thompson's godmother M. F. K. Fisher, and The Kitchen Garden Cookbook (1995).
data.text:
